items.summary: Update the application's color palette in frontend/index.css to use the same tonality as the logo colors. Replace the current warm orange primary and deep navy blue secondary colors with colors that match the logo's visual identity while maintaining appropriate contrast ratios for accessibility.

Update the theme color in frontend/index.html and frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest to match the updated primary color from the new palette, ensuring consistency across browser UI elements and PWA theming.
